title: FOR SALE: Nice Midgrade T205 Cobbs + Mattys + Hobby Name Corr. No Cin.

posts.post_title: FOR SALE: Nice Midgrade T205 Cobbs + Mattys + Hobby Name Corr. No Cin.
posts.post_content:
I'm brokering these cards from the recent North Carolina find. To note, the gentleman that owns the collection will be the payee, by money order or cashiers check only, and he will also handle the shipping, although I completely stand behind any transaction(s).

Emails have priority: [url]trae@t206.org[/url]
Offers welcome.

Scans and prices here:
[url]http://www.collectorfocus.com/collection/ncfind/t205-gold-borders[/url]
(more T205 being added soon)
Bump for slight price redux. Offers welcome.
